title: EXO's Travel the World On a Ladder
overview: EXO's new reality show where they travel around the world while making decisions by using a Ghost Leg lottery (known as "ladder climbing" in Korean). For the first installment, the group's subunit EXO-CBX heads to Tottori Prefecture in Japan, where they enjoy lots of delicious food and shopping. With parts of their trip left up to chance, the three EXO members encounter unexpected situations as they explore the area.
